name: Car repair
description:
The training game "car repair" will be interesting not only for boys, with their love for cars, but for girls. In a free game - cars are real living beings, and they need repair besides repair, which undoubtedly will interest little fashionistas. Pick up the color of the body, coloring, a model of the wheels and much more to do to make your car the best.
Girls and boys are fond of different subjects, which then form their hobbies. Someone plays dolls, dressing princesses, who are in cars, presenting themselves as a tough rider. Developing game car washing provides the player a complete set of tools for car care. Young mechanics will clean cars of dirt, repair dents and holes, polish the body. Do everything that real adult mechanics do.
Children are constantly exploring the world around them. Car repair stands out among other games for kids. The game provides an opportunity not only to play, but also to learn, develops attention and memory. The child studies the structure of the car, learns the basics of repair in a simple game form. As a game for the child, it is perfect for children from 3 and above, who are just beginning to explore the world. Many educational games for children do not detain the child's attention for a long time, however, car washing due to their colorful and pleasant graphics will definitely not leave your child indifferent. Like many children's games, you can install this application on the device absolutely free of charge, which will allow your kid to enjoy the game without extra financial costs.
Games for children car cleaning provides an extensive set of functions for your young mechanics. Taking on the role of a car mechanic, the kid will have his own garage at his disposal. In it will come broken cars, which will have to be repaired. There are several types of vehicles: cars, trucks and passengers. Each view is represented by a set of well-designed cars, different sizes and models.
And so, the first car drives into your garage. A small car mechanic is already ready! What will young repairers? First of course, the player will inspect the car for damage and repair them. This can only be external damage to the body: rust, dents, and maybe something more serious. To do this, you will need to look under the hood and inspect the bottom of the car. Of course after a successful repair, you will need to paint the car in a new shiny color, and in addition you can install stickers on the car. It will make it more beautiful and show that it is your car.
Car repair for children does not end with conventional cars. As it was written above, the game has a large car park, which the player will need to face, and this includes: repair of a bus, repair of a jeep, repair of a sports car. And each kind of car has its own characteristics. Such a variety of cars will allow your child to familiarize himself with all kinds of vehicles in more detail, having studied them from the inside. The child will receive new knowledge and skills that will be useful to him in his studies and everyday life.
Games for children such as car care are a great choice for your child. Pleasant graphics, fun gameplay will help your child master the profession of mechanics. Playing with the whole family, you can spend pleasant time with the child, showing him such seemingly simple things, but undoubtedly important at such a young age when children try to learn as much as possible about the world around them.
